p:
Eligible participants were patients aged 18 years and older with previously untreated histologically confirmed peripheral T-cell lymphoma of the WHO 2008 subtypes:
21 peripheral T-cell lymphoma not otherwise specified, angioimmunoblastic T-cell lymphoma, anaplastic lymphoma kinase (ALK) negative anaplastic large cell T-cell lymphoma, enteropathy-associated T-cell lymphoma, and hepatosplenic γδ T-cell lymphoma.
